title: Argentina : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 26.2 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Number of users in millions about 25.0 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: In general Number of users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
